title: Earthworms
brief_description: The earthworm is dissected and its muscular, nervous, digestive and reproductive systems are examined; the bisexual reproductive process is shown, and the emergence of a young earthworm completes the life cycle study. The importance of earthworms in aerating and enriching the soil is stressed.
